product_name: La Roche-PosayLipikar Eczema Soothing Relief Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsHSA/FSA eligibleLa Roche-Posay Lipikar Eczema Soothing Relief Cream for face and body helps soothe irritated, itchy skin associated with eczema while hydrating dry skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsRelieves dry skin, irritation and itchy skin associated with eczemaHelps visibly reduce signs of eczemaSteroid and antibiotic-free eczema cream for sensitive skin on the face, body and handsComforting, non-greasy eczema cream formula provides instant and long-lasting relief with colloidal oatmealReplenishes skin's essential lipids with shea butter and glycerinSuitable for adults and children over 3 years oldSoothes irritated, itchy skin and dry skin with niacinamide and La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring WaterSafe for sensitive skinAccepted by the National Eczema AssociationDermatologist, pediatrician and allergy testedKey Ingredients1% colloidal oatmeal helps protect the skin while relieving irritation and itchy skin caused by eczemaShea butter hydrates and replenishes essential skin lipidsNiacinamide helps soothe dry skinLa Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water is naturally rich in minerals with scientifically demonstrated soothing and antioxidant propertiesFormulated WithoutFragranceParabensSteroidsItem 2572921How To UseApply to any targeted area of the body or face prone to eczema, such as elbows, knees, or hands. Gently massage product on skin until absorbed. Can be applied all over the body if needed.IngredientsActive: Colloidal Oatmeal 1%. Inactive: Water, Shea Butter, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Mineral Oil, Niacinamide, Cetearyl Alcohol, Rapeseed Seed Oil, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Peg-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Peg-20 Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Dimethiconol, Mannose, Xanthan Gum, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Capryloyl Glycine, Microcrystalline Wax, Sorbitan Tristearate, Paraffin, Disodium Edta, Vitreoscilla Ferment, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Apply to any targeted area of the body or face prone to eczema, such as elbows, knees, or hands. Gently massage product on skin until absorbed. Can be applied all over the body if needed.

reviews.headline: Great product - highly moisturizing!
reviews.comments: Love this product, super moisturizing and got rid of the dryness on my legs and feet. It's also unscented, so I can wear a perfume without clashing scents. Plus, it's non-greasy so I can use my phone right away. Need a travel-size for my purse!

reviews.headline: Amazing for eczema
reviews.comments: My daughter has really bad eczema flare ups on the face, inside her elbows and knees and we've tried a variety of creams that do not work. After using this cream and cleanser for 3 days her skin is getting so much better! Even triamcinalone didn't provide these results!

reviews.headline: Amazinggg!
reviews.comments: I bought this because I have severe eczema and it's clearing it up already after only a few uses and my skin already feel so much softer compared to the alligator feeling skin I had before. So it you have scaly eczema or any kind of eczema buy this!!

reviews.headline: I will be purchasing this again
reviews.comments: I purchased this for my husband as he has some dry flakey skin around his nose . Typically he uses aquaphor , this is even better and not as greasy. You can use it on your entire body. I definitely recommend

reviews.headline: life changing
reviews.comments: this is the only moisturizer i can use that really calms my flakey flare ups on my skin. and it makes my skin look like i actually used a fancy moisturizer and i can use it on my whole body. truly my holy grail product

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: It helps relieve my itching and doesn't feel sticky.

reviews.headline: Works exceptionally well
reviews.comments: I bought this a few days ago for eczema.  The morning after first use my skin didn't feel uncomfortable anymore.  That same evening the flaking was done.  Three days later, most of my eczema patches have gone away and the remaining ones are significantly improved.  This product has saved me a lot of discomfort and self-consciousness already.

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: I've tried everything from eczema honey to homeopathic balms, and this is one of the few things that will calm down my eczema! I failed to realize to read the darn label and just now noticed I can put this on my FACE! OMG! I have been breaking out on my face recently due to allergies, I get horrible eczema on my cheeks and after applying this mixed with snail mucin from cosrox HOLY GRAIL! Please don't EVER change the formulation for this product, I only wish they sold this in a bigger bottle with a pump!! WE NEED THIS IN A BIGGER BOTTLE!

reviews.headline: BURY THIS WITH ME!
reviews.comments: NOTHING else works for my eczema, it has completely changed my skin and healed my eczema on my hands.

reviews.headline: It works.
reviews.comments: Ive had eczema my whole life and ive tried multiple products but havent had any luck with any. This product has helped me reduce the itchyness/ redness on my face and neck. I recommend it. At first i did have a tingling sensation but it went away. I apply at night time before i go to bed. I would recommend it üëçüèº

reviews.headline: Only thing that has helped
reviews.comments: I have always had problems with my skin, i have dry patches around my nose and mouth constantly but recently my forehead has had pealing skin and it has been so dry and anything I have used in the past has either burned or made it worse. I saw this and I gave it a try, I use this after I wash with the oil cleanser of the same line and i do use a lot of the moisturizer but it doesn't irritate or burn my skin, it has stopped the patches and pealing skin. It has also made my skin look more glowy and a lot softer. 10/10 recommended for very sensitive skin (I do have dermatitis also)

reviews.headline: I never want to be without this.
reviews.comments: This worked incredibly well on my  eczema.  It helped with the dryness and itching.  This is the second tube I purchase and since it was on sale, I stocked up.

reviews.headline: SAVED MY SKIN
reviews.comments: ive been dealing with the worst skin issues for almost a year and this is the first product ive used where I actually see RESULTS with my redness and flaking slowly going away. My skin is going back to feeling soft and i could cry of happiness im so happy i found this!!

reviews.headline: Better than Most
reviews.comments: I purchased and used the whole bottle, and even though I loved it I decided to try other brands. And after  using other eczema creams I will come back to this and repurchase the product. It absorbs well and fast, and it doesn't feel heavy. It feels smooth and it is very hydrating for those lingering super dry eczema spots.

reviews.headline: Super effective!
reviews.comments: My face suddenly became red and began burning and peeling.  I used this cream and it cleared up overnight!  I now use it every night and morning.  Like a miracle!

reviews.headline: New regular in my skincare routine!
reviews.comments: I have recently been dealing with dry patches on my face, especially around my nose, eyebrows snd chin. It was causing my face to feel extremely greasy, yet dry at the same time. When i would shower there would always be an insane amount of dead skin, and after using my regular products in my skincare routine my face was not feeling hydrated at all. I picked this up after doing some research and after one use my skin feels plump and hydrated! I have extremely fair and sensitive skin with alot of redness on my face and this product did not itritate my skin in the slightest. I applied after using La Roche Posay's gentle face wash for normal to oily skin and the difference I feel after this combo is insane. A little product goes a long way, as it is a little thik when cominb out of the tube but this is my new go to moisturizer!

reviews.headline: I'm really impressed by this product!
reviews.comments: I have been suffering from eczema for a while now and I didn't want to use my prescription anymore or cortisone lotions. I wanted to use something a bit more natural. This helps with itching, redness and bumps. It's moisturzing as well. I really love using this lotion and I wish I had found this sooner.

reviews.headline: Miracle cream!
reviews.comments: I have very severe eczema and I have tried everything for my face rash. This cleared up the redness in 1-2 days and it also is helping clear up the flakiness on my face. I use it on my body too and it helps and feels very nourishing.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments:
I have psoriasis and eczema and I have tried all kinda lotions. None of them seemed to have helped but I came across this and gave it a try. 

My skin was instantly moisturized and it dulled the redness even the reduced flakiness by alot. I'm impressed and am so excited that I've finally found something that actually works.

reviews.headline: Works !
reviews.comments: My daughters ezcema started getting bad again and we tried this for the first time and it worked !! The itch went away the first day and the rash started getting bettwr the second day !

faceoff_positive.comments: Thank you La Roche-Posay for making this product. I have mild eczema along the sides of my arms, thighs and under my chin. This product when used regularly produced a significant difference in the visuals, touch, and feeling of my skin. It wasn't heavy and buttery like most lotions, but more of a balm that, sunk into your skin and left no residue. Just beautiful glowing skin! The product is odorless, leaves no smudges on leather car seats and overall does a wonderful job. I am so happy to finally see this lifelong struggle fade away, as I embrace healthy skin! I received this product complimentary courtesy of influenster, but the product has truly won me over to La Roche-Posay alone!
faceoff_positive.headline: Difference you can see and touch!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have mild eczema on my fingers along with having sensitive skin on my face, so I thought this would be a nice moisturizer to help with both problems. I've tried La Roche Posay products before, so I was under the assumption this would be another worthwhile purchase. I bought this product two days ago and both times I've used it (immediately after washing my face), it's made my skin itchy, inflamed, and red. This evening, after applying it, my skin got so itchy and red I thought I was having an allergic reaction to my sheets or to one of my makeup brushes/products, but as soon as I washed my face again, the itchiness went away. I only thought to wash my face after reading a review of someone who experienced something similar to what I did. I was even about to take allergy medicine and apply cortisone to perhaps help with the itchiness and discomfort. I would NOT recommend this product whatsoever.
faceoff_negative.headline: Made my skin itchier!
